channel.title: Spawning Items (Pimp Scape)
channel.description:
Ok, i got pimpscape. im making a place. I want to spawn 1000000 coins. I had the code set up perfectly to. I had it set it in Autospawn.cfg and in Drops.cfg and itemspawnpoints.java. Idk which one is should use to.
for auto spawn [code]spawn = 995 2904 9684 0 0 0 0 0 1 coins[/code]
For drops [code]drop = 995 2904 9684 5000000 0 2 coins[/code]
and for itemspawnpoints.java
[code]ItemHandler.addItem(995, 2900, 2682, 1000000, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // coins4[/code]
PLease help. I really want this to work.
It's been like, 20 hours, and no-one has helped me!

item.title: Spawning Items (Pimp Scape)
item.dc:creator: @gurt gurt
item.description:
@gurt wrote:

Purpose: Add drops to your server (money, phats any items…)

Difficulty: 1.5/10

Server base: Pimpscape (works for most)

Required Knowledge: Copy + paste and know where to paste it, Ctrl+f

Files Modified: Itemspawnpoints.java

First open up Itemspawnpoints.java and press Ctrl+f
find something like this…

ItemHandler.addItem(Then go to bottom one and copy the last code…For example this one is on my source…

ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3251, 3417, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Blue party hat

1st #### is item id 2nd is “X” location and “Y” is the 3rd #### the 1 is how many
Than put in any Item id and location and save + compile…your done!

There you go…Creds 100% me!

Heres link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,152388.0.html

Your welcome Gurt

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Items (Pimp Scape)
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

If you’re wanting to spawn 1000000 for yourself, just type this in your chatbox, just how’d you speak as usual:

::pickup 0995 1000000

This should give you 1000k.

If you want the coins to just spawn on the ground somewhere, you must add that in drops.cfg, like this:

drop = 995	3009	3207	100000	0	1	Coins

drop = Item ID, Item X Coord, Item Y Coord, Amount, Height (Leave 0), Type (Leave 1) and a description

Autospawn.cfg is for monsters only.

Read full topic
